Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: One of the best places in Amsterdam to get a craft cocktail. Even though the bar is part of the hotel, you enter the bar from a separate entrance. Every thing at this bar makes sure you are engulfed in this experience, with friendly, ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text:
Great hotel bar in the city center ! Always coming back for a cocktail or glass of wine. Really nice service, funny and attentive staff.
Will keep coming ! Thank you !

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Everything about the place exceeded my expectation. The ambiance is very cosy, the look and feel is amazing and the service was top class. Our waiter was very attentive, always keen to explain different drinks, their origin and how they are best mixed. Definitely going there again and would recommend the bar to anyone.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: One of my favourite bars in Amsterdam. The service is amazing - very professional and they know what they are talking about. It‚Äôs part of a hotel in the Center. The bar it self is a hidden secret!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: We had the best evening at this fabulous bar! The bartenders were the nicest people, and they were very knowledgeable, which is much appreciated for cocktail lovers. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Friendly staff, they always give you a warm welcome from the moment you enter the hotel until your seat. Good cocktails, nice ambience, music and interior. Perfect place for a fun flirty cocktail night.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text:
An amazing cocktail experience and highly recommended.

While yes this is located within a hotel and restaurant, the drinks here should ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Awesome place to have cocktails and have good time with your friends. Prices are average and service is good.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: The Pulitzer's Bar is a great example of a timeless, classic hotel bar. All the drinks were amazing, the bar team was super friendly and efficient and if you get a little hungry I definitely recommend their delicious bar bites.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Luca is the best host! Cocktail stories, friendly welcome and amazing(not too sweet) Italian style espresso martini. Thank you. Xoxo

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Such nice and professional staff. The service and the drinks were truly magnificent. Plus the ambiance and the food were top notch too, simply incredible. ‚ô•Ô∏è

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great bar! Very large selection of wines and spirits. They also have some signature cocktails that looked really good. Would definitely come back!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I had a well spend evening at the Pulitzer's bar! First of all: what a stylish interior! The service is excellent, the bartenders are genuine and it's noticeable that the mixologists have a great passion for their profession. You can really ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Friendly service, serious drinks. But does not seem to be a fully-stacked bar. Not all classics are served, e.g., they did not have all the ingredients for a Singapore Sling.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: One of the best hotel bars in the world, always a joy to be here. Good cocktails and it‚Äôs just amazing to have a drink and overlook the canals!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text:
Amazing atmosphere and great service! Cocktails are good and so the food !
We will definitively come back!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Best bar in Amsterdam! Great drinks, service and music in the most beautifully decorated canal house.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Awesome cocktails, nice ambiance, very friendly staff.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Terrible experience! We were celebrating my friend's promotion and heard good things about this place but we both were very disappointed. The cocktails presentation is very meh. The flavor was OK.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Wonderful place for a drink with nice views out the window,the service can be pretty slow but the staff are very nice.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: The place looks very beautiful inside as well as in their closed garden. But coffee? ?? When you pay over 3eur for a coffee(cappuccino or latte) you at least expect it to be prepared by barista and not simply by coffeemachine. Nevertheless the wine was delicious and atmosphere was great üòä

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Rather unique place, classy yet cosy place with friendly and fast waiters and exceptional drinks. Best to visit after the sunset to fill the dark and warm atmosphere of the bar.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very nice and attractive place. A New enjoyable discovery. To be visited!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Spent a few hours drinking cocktails here, had a phenomenal whisky sour and would highly recommend the "countess"!!  Amazing service from our mixologist, he was super attentive and we loved watching him make the drinks! Lovely and warm setting too with great interiors!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Spent a few hours drinking cocktails here, had a phenomenal whisky sour and would highly recommend the "countess"!!  Amazing service from our mixologist, he was super attentive and we loved watching him make the drinks! Lovely and warm setting too with great interiors!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Excellent cocktails (the best we had in Amsterdam) with a really cool theme.  However, this place was quite understaffed.   The 3 people there were working really hard, but just couldn‚Äôt have possibly kept up with the demand.   If they had 1-2 more people helping out, this place would have been perfect.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Drinks are nothing special, but on the pricier side even for cocktail bars. Interior is beautiful but not spectacular. Personnel is wearing masks and gloves, which is great.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Cosy and friendly atmospere. Warm and well decorated place. Frienldly service and nice coctails and drinks.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I chose this bar at random to visit and I was blown away. The service is excellent and the vibe was easy-going. I loved the fact that the bartenders take time to chat with you if you like. This place felt like a respite from the crowded streets of the busiest parts of Amsterdam.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Really like the ambiance, beautiful antique decor with a beautiful canal view backdrop. I love a great cocktail, but have to say I have yet to try one here that I love. I would rather recommend you get a glass of wine, and the cheese plate is the BEST i've ever had.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: A Very classic bar, with really nice and very attentive staff. As a regular guest, I always enjoy one of their creative cocktails. It is easy to understand why they got awarded for best bar in the city. Definitly recommend.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text:
Nice setting, perhaps inside turns to be a bit too dark if outside the Sun is still up.
Service is good, enjoyed the signature cocktails. Other drinks, like wine are ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Cocktails are really good but expensive. They bring nice snacks with drinks. Average price for cocktails 15 euro. Beers are more like normal price 6 euro. Nice to try sometimes

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Love this bar! Beautiful and relaxed setting. Not cheap but worth it. Cocktails are perfect and such a cozy space!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: So nice to have a city insider to help me find this beautiful gem.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very knowledgeable bartender, who was very patient with me in explaining the best way to appreciate Scotch. Atmosphere was cool and calm. A great place to grab a drink after a long day of work, or in this case traveling. Unwind, grab a drink and have a conversation with a good friend or stranger.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: One of my favourite hangouts in Amsterdam. The bar is super gezellig and the cocktails and wine list extensive. Sometimes wish the bar staff would be a bit nicer, can give off some attitude on occasions that dampens the mood. Definite highlight of Amsterdam and worth a visit

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I recently organized an event with a group of my coworkers and needed to find a local bar for the venue.  I saw the great reviews online and decided to give this place a shot.  I called ahead to make sure they could accommodate our party ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Nice cocktail ideas and ambience, but unfriendly staff and one tasteless cocktail made a very bad impression on our group of 8,and made us leave after one drink. Waiter didn't care about that cocktail, or experience, or about his behavior. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Our server was very sweet, but the drinks are just outrageously priced for what you get (in my case a bog standard old fashioned for ‚Ç¨20 :/ ). I appreciate places like this for helping divest the wealthy of their money, but the rest of us who don‚Äôt care about silly excess should probably avoid.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Really nice stuff and good cocktails

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Nice bar with Gatsby named drinks. Service is a bit slow and the drinks are a bit pricey for what you get. It's a nice place to meet up with a friend or two and grab a drink before or after dinner. I wouldn't stay for more than one drink though.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: The jewel in Amsterdam's crown. Exceptional service. Exceptional ambiance. Oh and INCREDIBLE drinks. It's not cheap but you pay for the entire experience this hotel bar offers you and based off that - well worth the money.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Had lots of fun here with my husband. Drinks were good and the lady that served us was very friendly. We will visit again soon!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: In a repeat visit, detached impersonal service on a night which wasn‚Äôt all that busy. No one ever really greeted us, no one refilled our waters, no one asked how our drinks were. In a bar like this, that‚Äôs inexcusable. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: We stayed in the Pulitzer hotel our first time in Amsterdam last year and I will never stay anywhere else. Beautiful hotel, friendly staff and perfectly curated. Our first night, we went down to the hotel bar and made friends instantly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I just LOVE the atmosphere, and the prices are not too high

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I love the ambiance of this place. Dark green walls and green velvet furnishings, gorgeous. The cocktail I had was very good; however, the prices are really high, hence the 4 stars. The ambiance *almost* offsets the high price, but not quite.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very fancy place, even though the atmosphere was casual. The cocktails were very experimemtal. I would have wished they had some more "classic"/boring cocktails for the less adventurous types

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Perfect, posh place. Great staff. Wonderful drinks.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text:
Inside the stylish Pulitzer hotel lies a timeless cocktail bar.
Renovated along with the entire hotel, it now lives up to its reputation through its classic menu and effortlessly elegant atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Nice cocktail bar under the Pulitzer hotel. All the cocktails are described with a short story, rather then ingredients. So the waiter/waitress will explain your everything in details.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Surely one of the gems in the Amsterdam bar scene crown, this is wonderful final stop of the evening. The inventive list of cocktails is expertly executed and will leave you wanting to sample the lot. The only shame is having to leave the Pulitzer if you‚Äôre not staying the night.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great cocktails but even more important, very good setting and vibe. The seats in front of the window are prime real estate. Its my fav go to cocktail bar with bros and dates

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I work in the industry and usually don't have a very high opinion of hotel bars but this is by far one of the best! The bartenders are very experienced and enjoy what they do which results in mouth-watering cocktails.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Cosy and chic, cool in summer when it is hot outside. Warm and a great atmosphere. Lovely to celebrate a special day in an intimate way with grat cocktails and nice service

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Beautiful classy setting and some of the best cocktails in town. Bartenders know their stuff. Classy, comfortable yet very accesible for any occasion.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very cosy place, very nice atmosphere... recommended!!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Pleasant intimate atmosphere with 20's music and awesome staff! A bit disappointed by some cocktails but will come back to try some more!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Excellent service, delicious cocktails!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Nice Martini for sure, Order the Tempranillo Reserve nice bottle. Food in the attached restaurant exceptionally good for Amsterdam and the service  exceptional.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere. The drinks are really good and not too expensive. Snacks are tasty and very good service

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Always good vibes here. Excellent service, nice food and very well balanced drinks. Good for an afternoon of relaxing or a night out with friends/significant other.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Fantastic cocktails and impeccable service. It gets busy quickly so arrive early because they don't take reservations.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great service, good ambiance, very good cocktails. This is a great spot for either a business meeting, a date or a drink with friends!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Whoever created the bar menu should take up another profession. One dimensional and poorly mixed drinks. Rooibos infusion and a peach liqueur over tequila doesn't work. Avoid. Cross the canal and go to the Hoxton, where they know their stuff.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very nice, classy atmosphere. We tried the Maid, the countess & french 75 - all were delicious!!!!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Fabulous!! Amazing drinks and the service is on point. Sophisticated yet cosy. Go here, it's everything!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: great cocktails, relaxed atmosphere, comfy couches, drinks on the more expensive side 15eur/cocktail but they're definitely worth it!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Our bartender "Philip" was awesome. Very passionate and knowledgeable about his craft. Excellent cocktails üòä

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Excellent cocktails, confortable lounge chairs and relaxed atmosphere. bit on the expensive side, around 15 euros per cocktail

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Good drinks and vibes. Friendly staff. Beautiful interior. Love this place!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Good and relaxing place to get drinks, the bartender team was very accommodating, and give good advices about the town.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Cocktails are great and cheese bitterballen are a fun take, wish it wasnt sooo busy but i guess thats a given

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Beautiful, quaint spot tucked away in the heart of Amsterdam. Great selection of drinks. Worth every penny!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very classy bar with great coctails . Good service and very cool vibe. My favorite bar so far in Amsterdam

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Did you know Hemingway used to go here? No?  Now you do and you're smarter. Stay away from the absinthe,  unless you like licorice,  then you're good to go.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Elegant but not pretentious in the Pulitzer hotel. Accessible from street as well. Warm and cozy atmosphere, friendly service. Fairly priced.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great cocktails and nice environment. Excellent service.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great cocktails, professional and friendly service, a bar to go!!! Keep up the good work!!!!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great drinks, very kind personnel! Do not miss the cocktails !

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Elegant bar/ good atmosphere/ reasonable cost for cocktails (15 euros)

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: We probably should have gone home after supper but decided to have a nightcap here and it was a treat. Waiter knowledgeable and fun.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great mixologists and atmosphere

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Wow, what a great cocktail! This was a perfect watering hole for a date on a cool rainy summer evening.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Speak easy themed night was sublime. Solid cocktails and entertainment. Lived the interior design.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Real classy upscale bar, service is the best. Top knotch bartenders

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Cosy and stylished atmosph√®re, good cocktails and nice staff. Amsterdam should have more place like this.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Nice place for cocktails! Not cheap but good atmosphere.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Lovely bartenders, fantastic cocktails, good atmosphere!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Cost winter hangout for a good chat and a real cocktail. The negroni are classic.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Not cheap, but if you need a good drink or glass of wine in a very chill, comfortable place, Pulitzer is your place.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: One of my favourite bars in Amsterdam. Great coctails and friendly staff

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Always happy to come back for a cocktail!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great service and range of drinks in an elegant atmosphere

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Service and cocktails are great. I can sit in a window overlooking the canal and people watch

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Nice bar. Delicious house champagne! Quite busy on a regular Monday.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: I was a little disappointed, the cocktails looked amazing, but were a little bland.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Very nice, stylish and cozy place to have something to drink and to have some good Bitterballen.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Upscale bar with amazing atmosphere. A little pricey but high quality.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great cocktails outside by the canal

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great cocktails and ambience, worth a trip to the 9 streets.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Pretentious place with unfriendly barman. Went there by accident and left fairly sharpish.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Really great service

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Great cocktails and good atmosphere

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: A nice quiet place for a cocktail. Great environment.

Review Text: Amazing ambiance and wonderful cocktails!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: You'd think hotel bars are snobbish and boring - not this one.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Sweet place , good choice , not to pricy , not to fancy .

Review Text: Great ambience and cocktails!

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
Review Text: Awesome cocktails, beautiful decor

Review Text: Nice service, amazing cocktails.

Name: Pulitzer's Bar

Name: Pulitzer's Bar

Name: Pulitzer's Bar
